params.minDestination: The minimum amount of output tokens that must be received for the transaction not to revert.
params.path: An array of token addresses. path.length must be >= 2. Pools for each consecutive pair of addresses must exist and have liquidity.
params.sourceAmount: amount of source token to swap.
params.v2RouterAddress: The UniswapV2Router router address to use.

returns._0: uint256 The destination amount that was acquired from the swap.

swapWithRouter(address[],uint256,uint256.notice: Swaps tokens using a given UniswapV2Router.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to swap tokens on Uniswap.
